loginRequired: Da fatan za a shiga don ci gaba
invalidCredentials: Imel ko kalmar wucewa ba daidai ba

emailNotVerified: Da fatan za a tabbatar da adireshin imel ɗin ku kafin shiga
passwordResetRequired: Ana buƙatar sake saita kalmar wucewa

emailAlreadyExists: Akwai asusu tare da wannan imel
usernameAlreadyExists: An rike wannan sunan mai amfani
invalidEmail: Da fatan za a shigar da ingantaccen adireshin imel
passwordTooWeak: Kalmar wucewa dole ta kasance aƙalla haruffa 8 kuma ta ƙunshi manyan haruffa, ƙananan haruffa da lambobi
passwordMismatch: Kalmar wucewa ba ta dace ba
verificationEmailSent: An aika imel ɗin tabbatarwa. Da fatan za a duba akwatin saƙon ku
emailVerified: An tabbatar da imel cikin nasara
invalidVerificationToken: Alamar tabbatarwa mara inganci ko kuma ta ƙare
passwordResetEmailSent: An aika umarnin sake saita kalmar wucewa zuwa imel ɗin ku
invalidResetToken: Alamar sake saita mara inganci ko kuma ta ƙare
passwordResetSuccess: An sake saita kalmar wucewa cikin nasara
sessionExpired: Zaman ku ya ƙare. Da fatan za a sake shiga
unauthorized: Ba a ba da izini ba
methodNotAllowed: Ba a yarda da hanya ba
unprocessableEntity: Abun da ba za a iya sarrafa ba
serviceUnavailable: Sabis ɗin ba ya nan na ɗan lokaci
fileTooLarge: Fayil ɗin ya yi girma. Matsakaicin girman shine 10MB
missingRequiredField: Filin da ake buƙata ya ɓace
unknownError: Kuskure da ba a sani ba ya faru
postLiked: Wani ya so post ɗin ku
postCommented: Wani ya yi tsokaci a kan post ɗin ku
groupInvite: An gayyace ku don shiga ƙungiya
orderDelivered: An isar da oda ɗin ku
accountVerified: An tabbatar da asusu cikin nasara
passwordChanged: An canza kalmar wucewa cikin nasara

marketingPromotion: Ƙarin tayi na musamman a gare ku
